title: First On-Campus Job @Career Center!
description: Contributing to alumni career development initiatives and providing valuable support through Career Centre services at Stony Brook University.

link.text: Visit Stony Brook University Career Centre

title: Started Masters @USA
description: Embarking on a new academic journey to deepen my technical skills and explore the frontiers of computer engineering at Stony Brook University.

title: Founding Engineer @Xoul Inc
description: Led the frontend development of an AI-powered entertainment platform, driving significant performance improvements, optimizing user experience, and integrating AI-enabled support for enhanced customer satisfaction.

title: Full Stack @soCommerz
description: Started as an Intern, transitioned to a full-time role. Delivered high-quality, industry-level client projects as a frontend-focused full-stack web developer at soCommerz.

title: Completed my Undergrad
description: A bittersweet moment as I bid farewell to my alma mater, cherishing the memories, friendships, and invaluable experiences that shaped me.

title: Project Intern @IIT Delhi
description: Was responsible for development of interactive machine learning software applications, under the supervision of Prof. Chetan Arora at IIT Delhi. Left due to unfavourable circumstances.

title: Won an International Hackathon
description: Was the Team Lead of the winning team at UNESCO India Africa Hackathon 2022, an international hackathon organized in collaboration with the Government of India & 20+ African countries

title: Technical Content Writer @Codedamn
description: Produced high-quality articles on different technical concepts appropriate for intended audience. Topics covered were node, JavaScript, and full-stack development

title: Won a National Hackathon!
description: Winner of Smart India Hackathon 2022 organized by the Ministry of Education, Government of India

title: Started as Frontend Developer @KonnectNxt
description: Joined as a Full-time SDE Intern at KonnectNxt (formerly Xcelero) where I worked with the product team to build the entire frontend of the platform

title: First time being a Mentor!
description: Started as a part-time Mentor for DSA and Full Stack Web Development at The 10x Academy

title: First Internship!
description: Began my first part-time internship as a Teaching Assistant at Coding Ninjas

title: Became Placement Coordinator of our College
description: Was selected as the Coordinator at Training and Placement Cell of our College. Became Head of Corporate Relations & Content Developer team later.

title: UI/UX & Extracurriculars
description: Worked as a Graphic Designer and managed multiple events with some great organizations and communities like Code for Cause, IOSD, and Google Developer Students Club of our College

title: Start College
description: Began studying Computer Science and Engineering at Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University
